description: Analyze MSFT financial statements (Balance Sheet, Income Statement, Cash Flow) to calculate key financial metrics.

turns.query: Calculate the Year-over-Year (YoY) growth rate of 'Total Assets' for 2025. Store the result in 'yoy_2025_growth_rate'.
Identify the fiscal year with the highest YoY growth rate for 'Total Revenue'. Store the year in 'highest_yoy_growth_rate_year' and the growth rate in 'highest_yoy_growth_rate'.
Calculate the 'Working Capital' (Current Assets - Current Liabilities) for 2024. Store the result in 'working_capital_2024'.
Calculate the 'Gross Margin' (Gross Profit / Total Revenue) for ALL available years. Store the result in a DataFrame named 'gross_margin' with columns ['Year', 'Gross_Margin_%'].
Calculate the 'Operating Margin' (Operating Income / Total Revenue) for 2025. Store the result in 'operating_margin'.
Calculate the 'Quick Ratio' ((Current Assets - Inventory) / Current Liabilities) for ALL years. Store the result in a DataFrame named 'quick_ratio' with columns ['Year', 'Quick_Ratio'].
Calculate 'Free Cash Flow' (Operating Cash Flow + Capital Expenditure) for 2025. Store the result in 'free_cash_flow_2025'.
Calculate 'Asset Turnover' (Total Revenue / Total Assets) for 2024. Store the result in 'asset_turnover_2024'.
Calculate 'Inventory Turnover' (Reconciled Cost of Revenue / Inventory) for 2024. Store the result in 'inventory_turnover_2024'.
Calculate 'Return on Assets' (Net Income / Total Assets) for ALL available years. Store the result in a DataFrame named 'roa' with columns ['Year', 'RoA_%'].
Calculate 'Return on Equity' (Net Income / Stockholders Equity) for ALL available years. Store the result in a DataFrame named 'roe' with columns ['Year', 'RoE_%'].
Calculate 'Days Sales Outstanding' (DSO) for the most recent year. Formula: (Net Receivables / Total Revenue) * 365. Store the result in 'dso_recent'.
Calculate the 'FCF Conversion Ratio' (Free Cash Flow / Net Income) for 2025. Store the result in 'fcf_conversion_ratio'.
Perform a Dupont Analysis for 2025. Calculate Net Margin, Asset Turnover, and Financial Leverage. Store the results in 'net_margin_2025', 'asset_turnover_2025', and 'financial_leverage_2025'.
Calculate the 'Rule of 40' score for 2025. Formula: (Revenue Growth Rate + Free Cash Flow Margin). Store the result in 'rule_of_40'.
